resources.string:
"John Christopher Depp II (born June 9, 1963) is an American actor, singer, producer, and musician.
He has been nominated for ten Golden Globe Awards, winning one for Best Actor for his performance of the title role in Sweeney Todd: The Demon Barber of Fleet Street (2008), and has been nominated for three Academy Awards for Best Actor, among other accolades.
He is regarded as one of the world's biggest film stars."
